radiographic_examinations.findings: Numerous gallstones, cystic changes at gallbladder fundus consistent with focal adenomyomatosis, moderate atrophy and fatty replacement of the pancreatic parenchyma, small amount of stranding and edema around the pancreas, 1.2 cm nodule associated with the right adrenal gland unchanged, small bilateral simple renal cysts, small intraluminal lipoma within the third portion of the duodenum, multifocal degenerative changes in the spine, small bilateral pleural effusions with adjacent atelectasis at the right lung base.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: 1.2 cm nodule associated with the right adrenal gland is unchanged dating back to Not specified.
